casebody.data:
Susan H. ABELES, petitioner,
v.
METROPOLITAN WASHINGTON AIRPORTS AUTHORITY. No. 17-138. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 2, 2017.

Motion of The National Jewish Commission on Law and Public Affairs for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The American Center for Law and Justice, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of The Becket Fund for Religious Liberty, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
